amendment.description: To extend the authorization of the Advisory Board on Toxic Substances and Worker Health.

vote.text: Amendment SA 995 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 995 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5790) To extend the authorization of the Advisory Board on Toxic Substances and Worker Health.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 995 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 995 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 1003.
